SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin

Class Main

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.Main
public class Main extends Object
Main runnable.

This implements the commandline --client and --server options.

Further CLI options are implemented individually within each component.

See Also:

  • ClientCLI
